pain_section.title: The Pain: Analysis Paralysis
pain_section.text: You're a creator. A developer. Your mind generates ideas faster than you can write them down. But traditional tools force you into a vicious cycle: endless lists, daunting backlogs, and the procrastination that comes with overwhelm. Every new idea becomes a debt. The cheap dopamine from social media seems more appealing than facing the mountain of tasks you've created for yourself.

solution_section.title: The Solution: Black Box ➔ Sniper Mode
solution_section.text:
InkFlow breaks this cycle with a two-step method.

1. Black Box: An infinite canvas to capture everything—code, sketches, ideas—without friction. No judgment. Just flow.

2. Sniper Mode: Drag ONE task from your pile into full focus mode. A Pomodoro timer protects you, and a context canvas keeps relevant information at hand. Nothing else exists. Just you and your mission.

engineering_section.title: Engineering Showcase
engineering_section.intro: InkFlow was built with performance and privacy as pillars.
engineering_section.question: "Why C++ for drawing on the web?"
engineering_section.answer: To achieve zero latency. The drawing engine is written in C++ and compiled to WebAssembly, ensuring that your digital pen is an extension of your thought, not a hindrance.
